title: Can I Migrate My Account To Garena?
body: So, this account has full of memories and hard work in it, I just want to ask Riot if I can migrate this account to Garena because I'm now living back in the Philippines and I can't play in EUNE because our country is too far, well I can play but I would be playing in 300ms every game. So yeah reply ASAP

replies.body: Due to the way their servers are hosted and run, we can't transfer accounts into or out of Garena unfortunately. Now that you're living there again, you should be able to create an account on the Garena servers though!
